website_summaries.verdict: An effective foot peel that's made with natural ingredients and works well for most consumers.
pros: Infused with plant botanicals and tea tree oil to soothe dry, cracked feet
Alpha hydroxy acid is effective at exfoliating skin
Feet feel soft and smooth after using them
cons: May cause irritation on consumers with sensitive skin

customer_reviews.title: Product works well just over priced.
customer_reviews.text: This product works well. It was way over priced though. I found it at Walmart for $2.98 each.
customer_reviews.author: J. Rhenee

customer_reviews.title: No more Pedicures, Thank  you E.T.S. & S. G. P. F. Mask!
customer_reviews.text: During this time of sheltering in place, this product is by far hands down a WINNER! This product will forever replace a pedicure for me! Thank you! Can not wait to use Earth Therapeutic Soft & Smooth Gentle Peeling Foot Mask again! ❤️❤️
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing. Your feet will love you. Just note that the peeling process starts later so do this at least 10 days before a special event
customer_reviews.author: Juliana R Galindo

customer_reviews.title: Feel like I wasted $20
customer_reviews.text: my feet have been peeling just like this for DAYS, I feel like it's never going to stop. What's more is that the skin under the peeled spots does NOT feel silky smooth. I'm peeling in all the places I didnt think would need it (arch, toes...etc) and nowhere where I really wanted it to (heels, balls of my feet). Should have just gone at em with a sugar scrub, ped egg and pumice stone.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Great product and it works
customer_reviews.text: A friend recommend to use it. Firs three day no results by day five after using the foot mask the skin stared to peal for a few day. I end up with baby feet . So clean, smooth and beautiful. No harm or bad reaction
customer_reviews.author: @TheChiGods

customer_reviews.title: An "Ok" product
customer_reviews.text: This product was odd. Did it work?...yes, to an extent. Will I buy it again? No I would recommend this for someone with cracked heals or hard calluses/corns. If your feet are soft, it's a waste of time and not worth it
customer_reviews.author: HonestBuyer

customer_reviews.title: Really works
customer_reviews.text: The best option to skips the nails salon between pedicures, loves how clean and soft my feet looks.
customer_reviews.author: leila mejia

customer_reviews.title: Works wonders
customer_reviews.text: I bit pricey here, Walmart use to sell them for 2.97 for one. But these are amazing once you have done the complete process, after all peeling is done your feet fell like they did when you were a child. I call it, now I have baby feet. This is needed so bad for people to shed and get all that old dry rough skin off!
customer_reviews.author: J Newell

customer_reviews.title: Not what I had hoped.  Didn’t work.
customer_reviews.text: Did nothing. I had such high hopes for these. I followed instructions to the Tee. Very sad. Will not repurchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ellen Reinhardt

customer_reviews.title: Super soft results
customer_reviews.text: Totally worth it! It takes about a week but what baby feet!
customer_reviews.author: erin

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work as well as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Does not work as well as advertised. Did not remove thick callous and feet are not “baby smooth”. Definitely not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Loved it
customer_reviews.text: It started working on the 3rd day. Worked like magic. Amazing results.
customer_reviews.author: Ivette

customer_reviews.title: Give It Time and Soak Your Feet
customer_reviews.text: I am disappointed that I spent a lot of money for this only to find the exact same product at Walmart for $2.99 per pack. Give it time...it took over a week before I started seeing results. Soak your feet every day. It seems to help the dead skin to let go. Don't pick the calluses....mine started to bleed if I tried to pick at them...couldn't help myself.. Soak and dry your feet before you put the booties on. It seems to help the product really soak in to the dead skin. I have seriously calloused, cracked and thick skin on my heels. I have the softest feet I've had in a long while
customer_reviews.author: Ozark Lass

customer_reviews.title: Amazing-No More Cracked Heels
customer_reviews.text: This mask was recommended by a friend. Once i saw how much her foot had peeled I had to try it myself!!! I'm amazed!! I think on day 3 (after using the mask) my feet began to peel for about 5 days or so (think it depends on your feet/skin). Now I've been able to maintain my feel with softening masks since all that dry skin is gone!!! HIGHLY recommend for seniors with cracked feet as well! its not intense (aside from the aroma of oils) but thats it!
customer_reviews.author: Jacci

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a less expensive foot peel that works well. This one is it. I definitely will be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Rupert

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: I was a little disappointed. I watched reviews and was expecting a bit more. I bought them specifically for the heel of my foot and didn't really work. I didn't notice the rest of my foot getting super soft. I would do more research and find something else if I did it again.
customer_reviews.author: Chiii

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: I used the product according to the instructions. Had minimal peeling around toes and in arch of foot which are two spot that didn't need it. Not effect at all on the rough dry spots like my heels.
customer_reviews.author: booklover157

customer_reviews.title: Not very effective
customer_reviews.text: Not as effective as other brands I've purchased. Only a small amount of peeling on tender underside of sole.
customer_reviews.author: jmd

customer_reviews.title: Soak 10 minutes per day after you mask
customer_reviews.text: Instructions do not mention soaking your feet BUT it works much better if you soak your feet for about 10 min each day!
customer_reviews.author: Beth Conaway

customer_reviews.title: Quick, easy & effective
customer_reviews.text: This product delivers what it promises & more. My daughter, grand daughter & myself have tried it with unbelievable success!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Caused burns and irritation
customer_reviews.text: My 17 year old daughter used this foot mask and now it looks like she has a chemical burn on her feet. Not only are her feet painful and burning but the redness has spread and gotten worse over the last two days. She left them on for 70 minutes and experienced no pain while wearing them. Only after removing them and rinsing her feet did they become painful. These obviously aren’t meant for everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been buying these at the local Walmart for a bit now, for me and my husband, and I love them!!! On the back it says that the dead skin and calluses on your foot will peel within 2 weeks, and it’s true!! I’ve been peeling off the dead skin and my feet feel amazing!! My husband loves them too, and he has very dry feet. The socks are a little on the small side, but we both have bigger feet. I plan on using these about once a month, just because I love them so much.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Effective and gross but so worth it
customer_reviews.text: I bought mine at Walmart for about three bucks a pair and it is very gross but they are very effective
customer_reviews.author: A&A

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I love these! They are definitely gentle for those who have sensitive feet. I’ve tried a few others an they burned my feet or damaged my feet so bad. Although I think the price online is too much you can get these at your Walmart for about 3 dollars. I would definitely recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: James McCabe

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these at my local walmart, since the baby feet ones wont get here before going put of town. I was worried ot wouldnt work and so far after 3 days I started peeling. The calluses are little more harder to get peeled off, but still working for the most part. I am going to do this at least ones a month during the summer weathers.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret

customer_reviews.title: AVOID!
customer_reviews.text: Like many posters here, I didn't buy mine thru amazon. I got a single packet at a big box store. I followed all of the instructions. They don't warn you of the weeks of frustrating, embarrassing and time consuming shedding/peeling you will go thru. I did the treatment more than 2 weeks ago and I am STILL peeling like a snake! I can't take my shoes off in public at all. The peeling is all the way up my ankles. I WILL NEVER DO THIS AGAIN!
customer_reviews.author: Melinda Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great product !
customer_reviews.text: Feet started peeling in about 6 days, great product !
customer_reviews.author: Jocelyn Lance

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Actually works. Over a week and the dead skin will start to fall off. Very itchy when it happens. the first day after initial use, it makes my feet feel numb and weird. Don’t know if it’s a reaction or just the process. Oh and at Walmart 1 package for both feet is like $2.00.
customer_reviews.author: Haylllleee

customer_reviews.title: Buy at Walmart
customer_reviews.text: This is a really great product. But extremely over priced on here. These are 3$ at Walmart or FredMyer !!
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I bought mine at Walmart it’s a lot cheaper. It works great. My feet were peeling for DAYS (which was oddly fun) it’s been about 2 weeks my feet are a lot better than what they were. Need to buy more
customer_reviews.author: Yadira candelaria

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievable Product - Highly Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I got this from Santa, in my stocking :-) My feet have not been this soft in my entire adult life! I have tried so many heel treatments over the years, including the cheese grater and paraffin at the salon. Sometimes they look letter temporarily, but then my dinosaur cracks return. I used this mask two months ago and my feet were peeling for two weeks, which was a little odd but so worth it! All the painful deep cracks are gone. There is virtually no “tread” on my heels. I had a recurring callus on the ball of my foot that literally fell away. Thst one took almost a month after the treatment.
customer_reviews.author: PhxTeacher

customer_reviews.title: Effective and does exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: This is the first peel ive done so i dont have anything to compare it to. However, its been now 4 days. It has started to peel. I found though it started to crack by day 3 but soaking your feet in water and moisturizing speeds up the process. Update: now by day 6. my feet are nasty looking. Working!
customer_reviews.author: Jazzychaos

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I'm addicted to these My feet take a well to start feeling but then huge chunk come off. They are so sorry and I maintain by using this brands moisturizing socks with tea tree oil in between. Walmart has these for less then 4 bucks a set but sometimes they are sold out. It's in the nail polish area.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for me
customer_reviews.text: It’s been almost 2 weeks and my feet are not peeling. I’ll stick to the other brand I usually use.
customer_reviews.author: Beka

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: This stuff Works! Its freaky how much skin comes off like a snake shedding its skin 😊
customer_reviews.author: Lester Carter

product_meta.title: Earth Therapeutics Soft & Smooth Gentle Peeling Foot Mask: 2 Pack
product_meta.description: A gentle elixir infused in a sock-type delivery system. Formulated with a safe, effective Alpha Hydroxy Acid Complex to gently exfoliate away hard calluses and rough, dry skin-leaving feet feeling baby soft, baby smooth. Enriched with soothing botanicals and deodorizing, healing properties of Australian Tea Tree Oil to protect, condition and calm the skin.
feature_bullets: Smooth, Soften and Peel Away Dry Skin & Calluses
Contains Alpha Hydroxy Acid Complex & Australian Tea Tree Oil

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
